headline: AppLovin Has Far More Worries Than a Short Seller's Report
summary: AppLovin faces escalating challenges from AI disruptions in ad-tech and gaming, overshadowing a recent short report, although analysts maintain a positive outlook.

headline: Wells Fargo Raises Take-Two Interactive (TTWO) PT To $301 Following Q3 Bookings Beat
summary: Take-Two Interactive Software Inc. (NASDAQ:TTWO) is one of the stocks that should double by 2030. On February 4, Wells Fargo raised the firm’s price target on Take-Two to $301 from $288 while maintaining an Overweight rating. This sentiment was announced as the firm stated that, as expected, Q3 2025 bookings and EBITDA outperformed meaningfully. Contrary […]
